meanings: (무섭거나 화가 나서) shake, tremble, quiver, shiver, shudder, quake

examples.korean: He became caught up in a seething mass of arms and legs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 법석을 떠는 사람들의 팔과 다리에 걸려 꼼짝할 수가 없게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He became caught up in a seething mass of arms and legs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Can’t understand the people who shake their legs like crazy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미칠 정도로 다리를 떠는 사람들 이해할 수가 없어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Can’t understand the people who shake their legs like crazy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I did horrible on my TOEIC test today because the guy next to me shook his legs like crazy the entire time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 옆에 앉은 사람이 시험시간 내내 미친 듯이 다리를 떠는 바람에 토익 시험 완전 망쳐버렸어. DARAKWON
examples.english: I did horrible on my TOEIC test today because the guy next to me shook his legs like crazy the entire time. Add to Wordbook
